org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern

Class RegexReplacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.RegexReplacement

  • @Plugin(name="replace",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
public final class RegexReplacement
extends Object
    Replace tokens in the LogEvent message.
